verses.verse: <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H788>Ashbel<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H315>Aharah<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
<S%H5119>Nohah<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> and <S%H7498>Rapha<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth.<s%>
<S%H1106>Bela<s%> had <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H146>Addar,<s%> and <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> and <S%H31>Abihud,<s%>
and <S%H50>Abishua,<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> and <S%H265>Ahoah,<s%>
and <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> and <S%H8197>Shephuphan,<s%> and <S%H2361>Huram.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H261>Ehud:<s%> these are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba,<s%> and they <S%H1540>carried<s%> them captive to <S%H4506>Manahath:<s%>
and <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> and <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> and <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> he <S%H1540>carried<s%> them <S%H3205>captive:<s%> and he became the father of <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> and <S%H284>Ahihud.<s%>

<S%H7842>Shaharaim<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of children in the field of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> he had sent them <S%H7971>away;<s%> <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> and <S%H1199>Baara<s%> were his <S%H802>wives.<s%>
He became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2321>Hodesh<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3103>Jobab,<s%> and <S%H6644>Zibia,<s%> and <S%H4331>Mesha,<s%> and <S%H4445>Malcam,<s%>
and <S%H3263>Jeuz,<s%> and <S%H7634>Shachia,<s%> and <S%H4821>Mirmah.<s%> These were his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households.
Of <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H36>Abitub<s%> and <S%H508>Elpaal.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H508>Elpaal:<s%> <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> and <S%H4936>Misham,<s%> and <S%H8106>Shemed,<s%> who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H207>Ono<s%> and <S%H3850>Lod,<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns;<s%>

and <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> and <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> who put to <S%H1272>flight<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath;<s%>
and <S%H283>Ahio,<s%> <S%H8349>Shashak,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%>
and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> and <S%H6166>Arad,<s%> and <S%H5738>Eder,<s%>
and <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H3472>Ishpah,<s%> and <S%H3109>Joha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%>
and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> and <S%H2395>Hizki,<s%> and <S%H2268>Heber,<s%>
and <S%H3461>Ishmerai,<s%> and <S%H3152>Izliah,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H508>Elpaal,<s%>
and <S%H3356>Jakim,<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> and <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%>
and <S%H462>Elienai,<s%> and <S%H6769>Zillethai,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%>
and <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%> and <S%H1256>Beraiah,<s%> and <S%H8119>Shimrath,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%>
and <S%H3473>Ishpan,<s%> and <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%>
and <S%H5658>Abdon,<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> and <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%>
and <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> and <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H6070>Anthothijah,<s%>
and <S%H3301>Iphdeiah,<s%> and <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8349>Shashak,<s%>
and <S%H8125>Shamsherai,<s%> and <S%H7841>Shehariah,<s%> and <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%>
and <S%H3298>Jaareshiah,<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham.<s%>
These were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households throughout their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3427>men:<s%> these lived in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
In <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> there <S%H3427>lived<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> whose <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah;<s%>
and his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon,<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> and <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%>
and <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H283>Ahio,<s%> and <S%H2144>Zecher.<s%>

<S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8039>Shimeah.<s%> They <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> over against their <S%H5048>brothers.<s%>

<S%H5369>Ner<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish;<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchishua,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H792>Eshbaal.<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was Merib <S%H4807>Baal;<s%> and Merib <S%H4807>Baal<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah:<s%> <S%H6377>Pithon,<s%> and <S%H4429>Melech,<s%> and <S%H8390>Tarea,<s%> and <S%H271>Ahaz.<s%>

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3085>Jehoaddah;<s%> and <S%H3085>Jehoaddah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5964>Alemeth,<s%> and <S%H5820>Azmaveth,<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri;<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4162>Moza.<s%>
<S%H4162>Moza<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1150>Binea;<s%> <S%H7498>Raphah<s%> was his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H5840>these:<s%> Azrikam, <S%H1074>Bocheru,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H8187>Sheariah,<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> and <S%H2605>Hanan.<s%> All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6232>Eshek<s%> his <S%H251>brother:<s%> <S%H198>Ulam<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H7992>third.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H1869>archers,<s%> and had <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> All these were of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
